import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Create a connection</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/customers/{customer_id}/connections"}></MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint is for providers that use API key or access key for authentication. Please use [Embedded Links](https://docs.supaglue.com/platform/managed-auth#oauth-20) for providers that support Oauth2 for authentication.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 Connection created

An object to override the default Destination configuration per connection.

</div></div><div><span className={"badge badge--info"}>oneOf</span><SchemaTabs><TabItem label={"Postgres"} value={"0-item-properties"}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"type"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`postgres`]"} schema={{"type":"string","enum":["postgres"]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"schema"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The schema you'd like to sync to. This schema must already exist. Supaglue will not create it. If not specified, the schema specified in the Postgres Destination will be used.","example":"customer_1_schema"}}></SchemaItem></TabItem><TabItem label={"BigQuery"} value={"1-item-properties"}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"type"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`bigquery`]"} schema={{"type":"string","enum":["bigquery"]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"dataset"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The dataset you'd like to sync to. This dataset must already exist. Supaglue will not create it. If not specified, the dataset specified in the BigQuery Destination will be used.","example":"customer_1_dataset"}}></SchemaItem></TabItem></SchemaTabs></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>standard_objects</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object[]</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

A list of case-sensitive Provider standard objects to by synced. If specified, this list will take override the custom_objects list in SyncConfig.

</div><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><div><span className={"badge badge--info"}>oneOf</span><SchemaTabs><TabItem label={"All"} value={"0-item-properties"}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"object"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The Provider object name (case sensitive)","example":"Contact"}}></SchemaItem></TabItem><TabItem label={"Postgres/BigQuery (Preview)"} value={"1-item-properties"}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"object"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The Provider object name (case sensitive)","example":"Contact"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"table"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The table to write the object to. If specified, this will override the default table used by Supaglue.","example":"my_contacts"}}></SchemaItem></TabItem></SchemaTabs></div><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem"}}>]</div></li></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>custom_objects</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object[]</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

(Preview) A list of case-sensitive Provider custom objects to be synced. If specified, this list will take override the custom_objects list in SyncConfig.


</div><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><div><span className={"badge badge--info"}>oneOf</span><SchemaTabs><TabItem label={"All"} value={"0-item-properties"}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"object"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The Provider object name (case sensitive)","example":"Contact__c"}}></SchemaItem></TabItem><TabItem label={"Postgres/BigQuery (Preview)"} value={"1-item-properties"}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"object"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The Provider object name (case sensitive)","example":"Contact__c"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"table"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The table to write the object to.
